Summary: It was a Green object going very fast coming from the southwest and heading Northease
trends: There has been one other sighting in Edwardsville
There were no other sightings in Edwardsville on or around June 2nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a bar in Edwardsville IL talking to a friend and a server when I happend to look up and see something Greeen, very bright and extremly large ( Way bigger the any aircraft I have seen) it looked as if it may have been exploding and seemed to have like a green tail to it. It was cloud out this evening so we know it was below the clouds. Several other people also happend to see it at the bar I was at. Then I mentioned it on facebook and people from sevearl miles away even acroos the river in st louis had also confirmed they saw the same thing. anyway it was moving very fast and it was gone as fast as it came. Sorry im not the greatest writer but what i saw was truly amazing.
